content:
StandardEndpointElement Class

Definition

Manages a standard endpoint element for a service application configuration file.

In this Article

public abstract class StandardEndpointElement : System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Inheritance
Object
ConfigurationElement
StandardEndpointElement

Creates a new instance of the StandardEndpointElement class.

protected StandardEndpointElement ();

Properties

EndpointType

Not implemented.

protected abstract Type EndpointType { get; }
Value
Type

Type.

Name

Gets or sets the name of the current endpoint element from a list of configuration strings for that element.

public string Name { get; set; }
Value
String

The name of an endpoint element.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute StringValidatorAttribute

Properties

Gets the collection of properties of the current endpoint element.

protected override System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection Properties { get; }
Value
ConfigurationPropertyCollection

A collection of configuration element properties.

Methods

ApplyConfiguration(ServiceEndpoint, ChannelEndpointElement)

Applies the content of a specific service endpoint to the current channel endpoint element.

public void ApplyConfiguration (System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint endpoint, System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ChannelEndpointElement channelEndpointElement);
Parameters
endpoint
ServiceEndpoint

An endpoint that enables clients to find and communicate with the service.

channelEndpointElement
ChannelEndpointElement

An endpoint element that defines the physical transfer of messages back and forth between the client and the service.

ApplyConfiguration(ServiceEndpoint, ServiceEndpointElement)

Applies the content of a specific service endpoint to the current service endpoint element.

public void ApplyConfiguration (System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint endpoint, System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement serviceEndpointElement);
Parameters
endpoint
ServiceEndpoint

An endpoint that enables clients to find and communicate with the service.

serviceEndpointElement
ServiceEndpointElement

An endpoint element that defines how clients find and communicate with the service.

CreateServiceEndpoint(ContractDescription)

When implemented in a derived class, creates a service endpoint from message information contained in the specified contract description.

protected abstract System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint CreateServiceEndpoint (System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription contractDescription);
Parameters
contractDescription
ContractDescription

Information about what is contained in messages being sent from an endpoint.

Returns
ServiceEndpoint

A service endpoint.

InitializeAndValidate(ChannelEndpointElement)

Initializes and verifies the format of the specified channel endpoint in a service application configuration file.

public void InitializeAndValidate (System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ChannelEndpointElement channelEndpointElement);
Parameters
channelEndpointElement
ChannelEndpointElement

An endpoint element that defines the physical transfer of messages back and forth between the client and the service.

InitializeAndValidate(ServiceEndpointElement)

Initializes and verifies the format of the specified service endpoint in a service application configuration file.

public void InitializeAndValidate (System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement serviceEndpointElement);
Parameters
serviceEndpointElement
ServiceEndpointElement

An endpoint element that enables clients to find and communicate with the service.

InitializeFrom(ServiceEndpoint)

Ensures that the specified service endpoint is not null and that its type matches the current endpoint type.

protected virtual void InitializeFrom (System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint endpoint);
Parameters
endpoint
ServiceEndpoint

An endpoint that enables clients to find and communicate with the service.

OnApplyConfiguration(ServiceEndpoint, ChannelEndpointElement)

When called from a derived class, loads the service description information from the configuration file and applies it to the runtime being constructed.

protected abstract void OnApplyConfiguration (System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint endpoint, System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ChannelEndpointElement channelEndpointElement);
Parameters
endpoint
ServiceEndpoint

An endpoint that enables clients to find and communicate with the service.

An endpoint element that defines the physical transfer of messages back and forth between the client and the service.

Parameters
endpoint

An endpoint that enables clients to find and communicate with the service.

A service endpoint element of a service application.

When called from a derived class, initializes and verifies the format of the specified service endpoint in a service application configuration file.

Parameters

Resets the internal state of the ConfigurationElement object, including the locks and the properties collections.

ConfigurationElement

The top level of a configuration element that has sub-elements.

Attributes
